GSD.description:
x86/entry: Add kernel IBRS implementation

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.57 by commit 62b4db57eefec6ab544749a4f0178c4f68bad835. For more details please see the references link.
